Package controller

Class AdminCreateEditClientScreenController

java.lang.Object
controller.AdminCreateEditClientScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AdminCreateEditClientScreenController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This is the controller class for the AdminCreateEditClientScreenController.fxml document and is not meant to be instantiated. The class will either load the form with Client data passed from the previous screen or will begin as blank text fields and combo boxes for the Admin user to enter the Client data into.

      public AdminCreateEditClientScreenController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method is called by the FXMLLoader.load() call contained in the previous screen. If modifying a Client record, the selected Client's data is passed into the text fields, otherwise they load blank.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      resourceBundle - An unreferenced ResourceBundle object passed automatically
      url - An unreferenced URL object passed automatically

    • onStateSelect

      public void onStateSelect(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method is an event handler on the StateComboBox. When a state is initially chosen, it sets the corresponding Region and fills the SalespersonComboBox and with the salespersons for that region. It also filters out the remaining states so that only states from that region are available. To get the full list of states back, the region needs to be changed.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Passed from the On Action event listener on the StateComboBox.

    • onRegionSelect

      public void onRegionSelect(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method is an event handler on the RegionComboBox. When the region is changed, it resets the StateComboBox with the states belonging to that region and fills the SalespersonComboBox with the salespersons for that region. The only way to change the StateComboBox items after that is to select a different Region.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Passed from the On Action event listener on the RegionComboBox.

    • resetRegionBasedInfo

      public void resetRegionBasedInfo(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Method resets the region based combo boxes back to the original state of the screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Passed from the On Action event listener on the Reset button.

    • onSaveButtonClick

      public void onSaveButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException, IOException
      This method is an event handler for the "Save" button that saves the entered Client info to the database and redirects the application back to the AllClientsScreen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Passed from the On Action event listener on the Save button.
      Throws:
      IOException - The FXMLLoader.load() call will throw this exception if the FXML document can't be found.
      SQLException - This execution will be thrown if the SQL does not execute properly.

    • toAllClientsScreen

      public void toAllClientsScreen(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method is an event handler on the "Back" button. When clicked, the button redirects the program to the AllClientsScreen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Passed from the On Action event listener on the "Back" button.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception gets thrown if load() cannot locate the FXML file

    • toSignOut

      public void toSignOut(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method is an event handler on the SignOut button. When clicked, the button redirects the program to the original Login Screen
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Passed from the On Action event listener on the SignOut button.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception gets thrown if load() cannot locate the FXML file
